Isabella Rodriguez.description: closing Hobbs Cafe for the day and preparing to go home (conversing about Isabella and Klaus are chatting about what dishes they will bring to the Potluck event, with Isabella bringing a vegan lasagna and buffalo chicken dip, Klaus bringing his homemade apple pie, and Klaus offering to help Isabella set up the drinks station for the event; they also plan to meet at the cafe at 4 pm the next day, and discuss gentrification after the Potluck.) @ the Ville:Isabella Rodriguez's apartment:main room:refrigerator
